meanings.definition: The act of reading quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent1: I practiced speedreading to finish my homework faster.
meanings.sent2: She learned speedreading to read more books in less time.
meanings.sent3: Speedreading helped me zip through my school assignments.
meanings.sent4: His speedreading skills were like a superpower during exams.
meanings.sent5: The workshop on speedreading made the technique seem easy to learn.

meanings.definition: A technique for reading at a rapid pace.
meanings.sent1: Speedreading is a useful skill for students with busy schedules.
meanings.sent2: The course taught me how to improve my speedreading abilities.
meanings.sent3: I tried speedreading, but ended up reading too fast to understand.
meanings.sent4: Her speedreading technique was as swift as a cheetah hunting its prey.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of speedreading became clear after just a few practice sessions.
